name: Buster
headline: Open source, AI Digital Workers for analytics & data
description:
We're building AI Digital Workers for every part of your analytics & data stack. 

You can think of our platform as a 24/7 team of AI data engineers, scientists, & analysts. Its modern, simple, & open source.

founders.name: Blake Rouse, Founder
founders.description: Blake Rouse is the co-founder and CEO of Buster. Previously, he led product development at a bootstrapped analytics startup (DataSpark, acqd by Threecolts). Blake is originally from South Carolina. He studied Product Management and Computer Science at BYU for three years before dropping out to start Buster.

founders.name: Dallin Bentley, Founder
founders.description: Dallin Bentley is the co-founder and CTO of Buster.  Before starting Buster, Dallin worked as a Cloud Security Engineer.  After that, he founded Leftovers (Surplus food marketplace) which was later sold. Dallin graduated from Brigham Young University with his Masters of Information Systems.

Chart

Last 7 days
•
What were our daily sales for each brand?
Daily Sales by Brand
Copilot
Styling
SQL
Certainly! Let's write some SQL to get you the daily sales for each brand you carry:
sql
Copy code
WITH monthly_sales AS (
SELECT
DISTINCT ON (DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date), ss.brand_id)
DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date) AS sales_month,
ss.brand_name,
SUM(ss.total_sales_amount) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date), ss.brand_id) AS total_sales
FROM
public.sales_summary ss
WHERE
ss.order_date >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 months')
)
SELECT
sales_month,
brand_name,
total_sales
FROM
monthly_sales
ORDER BY
sales_month ASC,
brand_name;
Let's now run this SQL to check the results it generates.
SQL ran successfully 0.47 seconds
Plotted data on a bar chart 0.61 seconds
That looks great. Feel free to follow up or ask how I got this.

Open source
Built by devs, for devs
Managed service
Usage based, cloud hosted
Code-based
Use git & deploy via CI/CD
SOC 2 Compliant
Enterprise grade security
Personalized, governed, & self-improving 
Built to understand your goals & surface personalized insights
Always learning
AI Workers learn & adapt over time. Their understanding of your business & your data improves with every interaction.
Customized to you
AI Workers build memory over time. They retain context about you, your goals, strategic initiatives & your data.
Deeply integrated
AI Workers can execute complex tasks without supervision, then allow you to confirm or tweak the results.
Guardrails & AI safety
Implement AI safety measures & guardrails. Get full visibility into what your AI worker is doing & how they’re doing it.
Enterprise-ready
We follow the highest security standards, are SOC-2 compliant, and use end-to-end encryption for all customer data. You can also deploy Buster in your own cloud.

Daily Sales by Brand
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/K1yQLJVcY8qn3j5agrRf0hPbjc.jpeg)
Chart
Table
Last 7 days
•
What were our daily sales for each brand?
Daily Sales by Brand
Copilot
Styling
SQL
Certainly! Let's write some SQL to get you the daily sales for each brand you carry:
sql
Copy code
WITH monthly_sales AS (
SELECT
DISTINCT ON (DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date), ss.brand_id)
DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date) AS sales_month,
ss.brand_name,
SUM(ss.total_sales_amount) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_TRUNC('month', ss.order_date), ss.brand_id) AS total_sales
FROM
public.sales_summary ss
WHERE
ss.order_date >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 months')
)
SELECT
sales_month,
brand_name,
total_sales
FROM
monthly_sales
ORDER BY
sales_month ASC,
brand_name;
Let's now run this SQL to check the results it generates.
SQL ran successfully 0.47 seconds
Plotted data on a bar chart 0.61 seconds
That looks great. Feel free to follow up or ask how I got this.

Personalized, governed, & self-improving 
Built to understand your goals & surface personalized insights
Always learning
AI Workers learn & adapt over time. Their understanding of your business & your data improves with every interaction.
Customized to you
AI Workers build memory over time. They retain context about you, your goals, strategic initiatives & your data.
Deeply integrated
AI Workers can execute complex tasks without supervision, then allow you to confirm or tweak the results.
Guardrails & AI safety
Implement AI safety measures & guardrails. Get full visibility into what your AI worker is doing & how they’re doing it.
Enterprise-ready
We follow the highest security standards, are SOC-2 compliant, and use end-to-end encryption for all customer data. You can also deploy Buster in your own cloud.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Buster**

Founded in 2023 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Buster is innovating how businesses use data and analytics by introducing open-source AI Digital Workers. Based in Salt Lake City, UT, the company currently operates with a lean team of three employees. Their mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to provide AI-powered data engineers, scientists, and analysts that can work seamlessly within your analytics and data stack.

Think of Buster like having an entire team of skilled data workers that are available 24/7. They are designed to enhance insights and optimize your data systems continuously. The platform is characterized as modern, simple, and, crucially, open-source, making it accessible for developers and organizations alike.

Buster’s offerings revolve around two core products:
1. **AI Data Analysts:** These AI assistants can interact with your data, perform complex analyses, and create visually appealing dashboards—all through a natural language interface, simplifying the usual data-heavy processes.
2. **AI Data Engineers:** This tool serves as a copilot for engineers, automatically detecting enhancements for data models, generating pull requests, and streamlining tedious tasks.

The company is tagged across several important fields like generative AI, data science, data engineering, visualization, and databases. Their systematic approach enables users to unlock deeper insights quickly while enhancing overall efficiency.

For those interested in experiencing what Buster offers, the website provides avenues for booking a demo, accessing their GitHub for development purposes, and diving into their AI Data Analysts and Engineers. 

In a world increasingly driven by data, Buster stands out by combining the power of artificial intelligence with an open-source philosophy—making it easier for organizations to tap into insights that truly matter.

To learn more, visit [Buster's Website](http://buster.so).
